title: Omnibus: a comics duet
description: Printed in IsraelTranslation into English: Maya ShimonyGraphic novel/novellasOmnibus consists of two comics novellas printed in opposite directions (you must turn the book over in the middle and start from the opposing cover.The two stories are unrelated; one in full color and the other in b/w and pink or blue.
author: Einat Tsarfati
